instruction.ambient: When measuring ambient temperature, place the device away form extraneous influences and allow it to stabilise. (Chinese)
instruction.important: IMPORTANT:Don't use module as a thermometer (Chinese)
instruction.object: When measuring the temperature of an object, don't disconnect the module. Simply place the temperature sensor up against the intended object. (Chinese)

placeholder.title: No save measurements yet... (Chinese)
placeholder.message: Timeline will display the history of your measurements (Chinese)
